Improvements.Improvement: Use method reference for cleaner code
Improvements.Description: In Java 8 and onwards, we can use method references for cleaner, more readable code. Instead of using a lambda expression like 'item -> path.addParametersItem(item.getPathParameter())', we can use a method reference.

Improvements.Improvement: Reduce code duplication by extracting common code into a helper method
Improvements.Description: There is repeated code for creating ApiResponse objects. This can be refactored into a helper method, which will improve readability and maintainability.
